name: Whole Cow - Already Processed
description: Premium Wagyu whole cow, already processed and ready for pickup. Includes all cuts from nose to tail - steaks, roasts, ground beef, and specialty cuts. Perfect for large families or those wanting maximum value and variety.
includes: All premium steaks (ribeye, filet mignon, NY strip, porterhouse)
All roasts (chuck, rump, eye of round, tri-tip)
notes: Processing and packaging included in price. Ready for immediate pickup or delivery. Best value for processed beef.

name: Half Cow - Already Processed
description: Premium Wagyu half cow, already processed and ready for pickup. Provides excellent variety of cuts for families wanting quality beef year-round. Includes balanced selection of steaks, roasts, and ground beef.
includes: Mix of premium steaks (ribeye, filet mignon, NY strip)
notes: Perfect for families of 4-6. Processing and packaging included. Most popular option for processed beef.

name: Live Wagyu - Butcher Drop Off
description: Live premium Wagyu delivered directly to your chosen butcher within 100 miles of Hondo. You coordinate processing and cuts to your exact specifications. Perfect for those wanting complete control over processing.

butcherRequirements.additionalNotes: Customer must arrange butcher appointment and processing. We deliver live animal to your chosen facility.

processingTime: Delivery within 1 week, processing time varies by butcher
notes: Processing costs paid directly to butcher. Delivery free within 100 miles of Hondo, $3/mile beyond. Customer arranges all processing details.
